keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Launch Coordinated Assault
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates launch their full assault against the New Fish-Man Pirates in Gyoncorde Plaza, with Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji leading the charge.
keyMoments.significance: First major coordinated battle showcasing all crew members' post-timeskip abilities.

keyMoments.title: Full Crew Engagement
keyMoments.description: Following Zoro and Sanji's displays, the entire crew engages the New Fish-Man Pirates, working together as a coordinated team.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's enhanced teamwork and tactical coordination after the timeskip.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

members.role: Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad Commander
members.joinCircumstances: Revealed as commander of a specialized unit within the crew.

keyMoments.title: Zeo Rallies Retreating Forces
keyMoments.description: As the New Fish-Man Pirates begin to retreat after Luffy's Haki display, officer Zeo rallies them by reframing their losses and declaring the Straw Hats their worst enemy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the deep-seated hatred and determination of the New Fish-Man Pirates despite overwhelming odds.

keyMoments.title: Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad Attacks
keyMoments.description: Jean Noueilles leads the Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad in an attack against Sanji, but their spike-based strategy backfires.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals specialized units within the New Fish-Man Pirates and their tactical approach.
